metadata.title: CVE-2022-41988 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in theOpenImageIO::decode_iptc_iim() functionality of OpenImageIO ProjectOpenImageIO v2.3.19.0. A specially-crafted TIFF file can lead to adisclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can provide a maliciousfile to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
